title: 820-2327 bios battery
message: i have this board with very slight water damage, its 2008 model, it has an actual rechargeable battery soldered on the board, that is water damaged a bit. What is this battery doing? only real time clock or for the bios as well? can this likely damage the bios too?

title: 820-2327 bios battery
message: It can be removed, just to keep the time when battery is removed.
